interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lavender Foot Peel Mask 2 Pcs for Softing Smoothing Feet,Peeling Away Calluses and Dead Skin CellsExfoliating Foot Mask,Repair Rough Heels,Get Silky Feet
Review Date: 2021/04/28
Store: BOOSCA
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BOOSCA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing,Nourish', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.24 x 0.47 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '783103348421'}
Review Text: I didn't think this would work but it does! It definitely makes your feet peel and after it's all done they are baby smooth. I followed the instructions and my feet peeled for approximately a week. After they were done peeling I gave myself a home pedicure because it didn't take off EVERY callus but it did well enough that they were soooo smooth afterwards. My feet are summer time ready!
Review Title: Really works, super soft feet
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
DeepDream Portable Electric Nail Drill - Professional Efile Nail Drill Kit For Acrylic, Gel Nails, Manicure Pedicure Polishing Shape Tools with 11Pcs Nail Drill Bits and 36 Sanding Bands
Deep Dream
{'Brand': 'Deep Dream', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Maximum Rotational Speed': '20000 RPM', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 4 x 2.6 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '191762584966', 'Manufacturer': 'Deep Dream'}
Just used the deep dream electric nail drill.  Love it, I will not use nail files again! Loved that it has a speed control where it can be slow to very fast for acrylic nails. It worked great on my natural nails. Will definitely keep using it!
Works fantastic! No more nail file for me!
VOOADA Electric for Face, Arm, Waist, Belly, Leg, Hip
VOOADA
{'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 7.87 x 2.05 inches; 1.37 Pounds', 'UPC': '699936288523'}
Great nail set! At first I thought it didn't come with any attachments, but they're actually on the bottom!
Easy to use!
Fog-free Dental Mirror and 4 Pieces of Stainless Steel Dental Pick Professional Oral Care Kit for Family including Dogs Oral Care
Sunrise glow
{'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 2.4 x 1.3 inches; 4.23 Ounces'}
The tools are exactly what you'd expect. I really just wanted this pack for the mirror. Well, I got it and now I realize I need to make a dental appointment! In all seriousness, the mirror works okay but after I pulled the protective plastic cover off it started to scratch badly. Don't know why.
Okay

Blue Sage De-Puffing Caffeine Eye Serum | Natural Anti-Aging Eye Treatment with Probiotics, Green Tea + Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Face to Tighten and Hydrate under Eye Skin, and Brighten Dark Circles
Blue Sage
{'Package Dimensions': '6.06 x 1.65 x 1.42 inches; 4.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '860004070450', 'Manufacturer': 'Blue Sage Skin Co'}
I couldn't use this product at all. Any time I tried to apply to my under eye it would burn really badly. I would have to immediately wipe it off. I always used a clean face when I applied this and it still burned.
Burned and I couldn't use
Black Wolf - Men’s Ultra Hydrating Moisturizer - 1.7 Fl Oz – Soothe Dry, Patchy & Flaky Areas on your Skin - Fast Absorbing Formula Won't Feel Heavy or Greasy - Sulfate Free for Dry Skin
Black Wolf
{'Brand': 'Black Wolf', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '5.39 x 3.15 x 1.46 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BLKWLF_MOIST_DRY', 'UPC': '850021340087'}
I like to use this moisturizer after I use the Black Wolf charcoal mask. It helps moisturize my skin and calm it afterwards. It's not greasy and moisturizes really well. It has a light scent that isn't too strong. I've been using this moisturizer for a while now and it hasn't caused any breakouts or dry spots. Really good product!
Smells nice, moisturizes, works well after black mask use
Lip Liner Set 12 Colors Natural Lip Liner Makeup Pencil Long Lasting Matte Velvet Lip Liner
Marine Forest
{'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Velvet', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Package Dimensions': '6.42 x 2.28 x 0.94 inches; 2.24 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843697955'}
I tried each one of these lip liners and they are not true to the colors on the pencils. I like how vibrant the colors are and how smoothly the liner goes on. Paired with a lipstick, they look really nice and work well. I just wish that the color was accurate. Other than that, great product!
Pretty colors, not accurate
2Pcs Mascara Black Volume and Length 4D Natural and Long Lasting Lash Blast Mascara, 0.27 Fl Oz
Marine Forest
{'Brand': 'Marine Forest', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Item Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.01 x 0.98 inches; 3.17 Ounces', 'UPC': '729843907382'}
I am very impressed with this mascara! It goes on very smoothly and creates a very pretty, long and bold lash. The mascara itself feels light on my lashes and dries quickly.
Very pretty, long bold lashes
KXAMELIE Nude Pink Press on Nails with White Stripe Designs Glossy Full Cover Medium Short Fake Nails Glue on Nails Tips stick on nails for Women Girls Finger Manicure 24 PCS
KXAMELIE
{'Size': '24 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'KXAMELIE', 'Style': 'French', 'Pattern': 'Striped', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4.09 x 0.63 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '749212759923'}
These nails are really pretty and have a great variety of colors. They are fairly long but I like that. I can cut and file them to size. These nails come with many different sizes guaranteeing the right fit for everyone. My daughter used these nails with some nail decals and applied a clear gel top coat to get them to look shiny. They are great quality and I love them!
Easy to use, pretty, variety of color

profile:
User Profile Summary:

- **Nail, Oral, Skincare, and Makeup Enthusiast**: The user is committed to high-quality grooming, maintaining a keen interest in makeup tools like lip liners and mascaras, alongside a strong focus on nail care.

- **Nail Art Appreciation**: They enjoy nail aesthetics and versatility, preferring products that offer a variety of styles and colors while allowing for customization.

- **Preference for Efficiency and Performance**: The user values tools that streamline their routines, seeking fast-absorbing, lightweight, and non-greasy formulas across their beauty regimen.

- **Quality Assurance with Sensitivity Considerations**: Performance and product quality are paramount, with an emphasis on gentle formulations and vibrant colors. They appreciate products that provide clear feedback on aspects like effectiveness.

- **Positive Experience with Versatility**: The user maintains a toolkit of multifunctional products, ensuring a seamless integration of various grooming and makeup needs.

- **Consistent Use and Integration**: They actively incorporate new finds into their routines, reflecting their dedication to sustained care across skincare and makeup.

- **Critical Feedback with Constructive Insight**: The user provides balanced critiques, showcasing their engagement with product effectiveness, particularly favoring lightweight formulas that yield desirable results without compromising quality.

- **Foot Care Interest**: Recently, the user explored foot care products, highlighting a growing interest in effective exfoliation and nourishment to enhance their overall grooming regimen, with a focus on achieving smooth, summer-ready feet. 

Overall, the user prioritizes high-quality, versatile grooming tools, integrating skincare and makeup while being discerning about product performance, including for foot care.
